thread.section_title: Alpha Flight Guru Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Alpha Flight Guru | alphaflightguru.com | 4 of 69
thread.title: Michael
thread.title_full: Alpha Flight Guru reviewed by Michael

author: Michael
title: Michael
text: I am yet to board my flight, but the reservation on line was easy and the communication from the Rep. was excellent, even from overseas. I explained my requirements and back came my Itinerary, with only a couple of Questions before I confirmed. The price and flight's were excellent.
